ExampleModTaunt.NAME: Taunt
ExampleModTaunt.DESCRIPTION: Force target attacking, decrease target !M! Strength .
ExampleModTaunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Force target attacking, decrease target !M! Strength .

ExampleModPowerball.NAME: Powerball
ExampleModPowerball.DESCRIPTION: examplemod:Dash , Randomly remove a DeBuff, draw !M! cards.
ExampleModPowerball.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Randomly remove a DeBuff, draw !M! cards.

ExampleModFrenzyingTaunt.NAME: Frenzying Taunt
ExampleModFrenzyingTaunt.DESCRIPTION: Force all targets attacking, decrease target !M! Strength .
ExampleModFrenzyingTaunt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Force all targets attacking, decrease target !M! Strength ，and lose #b2 Strength forever.

ExampleModSoaringSlam.NAME: Soaring Slam
ExampleModSoaringSlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all target at end of turn, consume examplemod:Dash to lose all target Strength .
ExampleModSoaringSlam.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all target at end of turn, consume examplemod:Dash to lose all target Strength .

ExampleModSweeperRammus.NAME: Sweeper
ExampleModSweeperRammus.DESCRIPTION: At end of turn or being attacked, gain !M! Thorns .
ExampleModSweeperRammus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At end of turn or being attacked, gain !M! Thorns .

ExampleModFrozenArmor.NAME: Frozen Armor
ExampleModFrozenArmor.DESCRIPTION: Gain Barricade , if already gained，gain !B! Block . Exhaust .
ExampleModFrozenArmor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Barricade , if already gained，gain !B! Block . Exhaust .

ExampleModMoltenRammus.NAME: Molten Armor
ExampleModMoltenRammus.DESCRIPTION: Gain Barricade , if already gained，gain !M! Strength . Exhaust .
ExampleModMoltenRammus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Barricade , if already gained，gain !M! Strength . Exhaust .

ExampleModChromeRammus.NAME: Chrome Armor
ExampleModChromeRammus.DESCRIPTION: Block !M! damage when being attacked , gain #b3 Thorns .
ExampleModChromeRammus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Block !M! damage when being attacked , gain #b3 Thorns .

ExampleModHextechRammus.NAME: Hextech Armor
ExampleModHextechRammus.DESCRIPTION: Loss 1 Thorns , gain !B! Blocks and 1 Dexterity .
ExampleModHextechRammus.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Loss 1 Thorns , gain !B! Blocks and 1 Dexterity .

ExampleModGuardianAttack.NAME: Guardian Fury
ExampleModGuardianAttack.DESCRIPTION: Deal same damage with self Thorns !M! times.
ExampleModGuardianAttack.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal same damage with self Thorns !M! times.

ExampleModDurianDefender.NAME: Durian Defender
ExampleModDurianDefender.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust NL Gain !M! plus value of Strength healing.
ExampleModDurianDefender.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! plus value of Strength healing.
